video-caption:
Ordinarily, I don’t like the really short subject lines the Obama campaign uses when they e-mail me, but yesterday’s — sent out by the Big O himself — made me grin. The subject line was simply “Marriage”. I think the Obama campaign just missed a huge opportunity to get Princess Bride-loving voters solidly on their side. Oh well.

(Alternate video link)
